document.full_text: ban ki-moon is planning to formally announce his candidacy for a second five-term as u.n. secretary-general early next week, u.n. diplomats said on saturday.
document.title: u.n.'s ban to announce candidacy for 2nd term: envoys
lines_and_colors: ban ki-moon is planning to formally announce his candidacy for a second five-term as u.n. secretary-general early next week, u.n. diplomats said on saturday.
